name: Wizard Game Alpha 0.6
description:
This is Wizard Game! Enter the arena and face a horde of enemies while dashing out of their way and destroying them with your Magic Burst! Eventually, once you've killed enough monsters you will be able to buy special abilities to even more effectively slay your foes.

Controls: WASD/Left Analog to walk around. Mouse/ Right Analong to aim. LMB/Any Trigger to fire a Magic Burst. V/X to Dash. Space/Y to use your ability.
